item.description:
Not sure what to bring with on a winter hike? Check out our list of clothing, gear, and equipment that you'll need for winter day hikes by clicking here.

Please join REI for their unique Used Gear Sale of imperfect merchandise. Prices are slashed 30-60% but firm. An REI membership is required to purchase. Not a member yet? A lifetime membership is only $20 and can be purchased on the day of the sale! Don't miss out on the Incredible Bargains! ALL SALES ARE FINAL- NO RETURNS OR EXCHANGES.

The process for admission to the sale varies by store location. Some stores may begin handing out numbered tickets as early as 8:00 AM so be sure to find out how they are doing it at the store you are going to - don't miss out on the best sales.

Please contact your local REI store for more site-specific details.

  • Boston REI Store
    401 Park Drive
    Boston, MA 02215
    (617) 236-0746
  • Framingham REI Store
    375 Cochituate Road
    Framingham, MA 01701
    (508) 270-6325
  • Hingham REI Store
    98 Derby Street, Suite 470
    Hingham, MA 02043
    (781) 740-9430
  • Reading REI Store
    279 Salem Street
    Reading, MA 01867
    (781) 944-5103

Â
item.name: Used Gear Sale - All REI Locations in Massachusetts
